entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-07-11
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Incorrect Override Suggested By "Generate overrides..." Refactoring #68994
  • Generators: ForCompilationReferences #68993
  • Roslyn requires the SizeConst metadata on a MarshalAsAttribute for UnmanagedType.ByValTStr but not UnmanagedType.ByValArray #68988
  • Consider making semantic snippet trigger case-sensitive #68985
  • Add friendly display of inline array instances in the debugger #68983
    17.8
  • 'GetDeconstructionInfo' doesn't return Deconstruct method symbol #68979
  • Intellisense won't show event names in VB.NET #68976
  • wrong namespace removal proposal when declaring a variable the the namespace-name later #68972
  • ExtractInterfaceCodeRefactoringProvider encountered an error and has been disabled. #68971

Closed

  • NullReferenceExceptions when using wrong conditional delegate types #65183
    17.7
  • Create email aliases for specific infraswat roles #64191
    17.7
  • Pressing Tab key causes unwanted code changes #68873
  • CS0029 when method has [DoesNotReturn] #68949
    17.8
  • Setting ProvideCommandLineArgs to the Csc/Vbc task includes non-Csc args #67102
    17.8
  • It looks like modreq(Out) is ignored in presence of modreq(In) for function pointers. #68977
  • IDE0057: Suggestion removes constant start index from Substring #68973
  • `ERR_AmbiguousPrimaryConstructorParameterAsColorColorReceiver` logic doesn't find generic extension methods #68796
    17.7
  • "async" detection refactoring bug #68945

PullRequests

Created

  • Require `SizeConst` for `UnmanagedType.ByValArray` #68992
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Avoid giving 'no best type' error when one of the types contains error types #68991
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • WIP: Implement json serialization/deserialization for LSP json messages. #68990
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Find compatible substituted implicit extensions #68989
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Remove Go To Symbol TypeScript service #68987
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged
  • Address PROTOTYPE comment in interceptors proposal #68986
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Disallow declaring required element fields for an inline array. #68984
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - Inline Arrays
  • Add Inline Arrays to Compiler Test Plan.md #68980
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - Inline Arrays, 17.8
  • Reduce array allocations in `PENamedTypeSymbol.TypeParameters` and `PENamespaceSymbol.GetMembers` #68978
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged

Merged

  • Fix indentation behavior of convert to block-body namespace #68428
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Move to using primary constructors. #68907
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Merge features/CollectionLiterals into release/dev17.7 #68866
    Area-Compilers, Needs Shiproom Approval, untriaged
  • Add EE tests for Inline Arrays #68981
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - Inline Arrays, Next
  • Remove host specific args from CommandLineArgs #68918
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next
  • Break individual string literals into multiple spell checking spans for all the individual words within them. #68909
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Crossgen for .NET 8 #68721
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Disallow test compositions with include/exclude parts overlapping #68965
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Update to Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.Testing 1.1.2-beta1.23357.1 #68970
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Improve detection of ambiguous type-or-value receiver when it possibly refers to a captured primary constructor parameter #68914
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - Primary Constructors, Next
  • Merge latest bits from `main` into `roles` feature branch #68928
    Area-Compilers, untriaged

Updated

  • Enable support for an LSP client to open source generated files #68771
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Misc improvements of OneOrMany #68948
    Area-Compilers
  • Translate `ref readonly` in new synthetic call factory and unskip arglist tests #68951
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - Ref Readonly Parameters, 17.8
  • Emit modopt for ref readonly parameters in function pointers #68728
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - Ref Readonly Parameters, 17.8
  • Improve sequence point placement in primary constructors and records #68765
    Area-Compilers, 17.8
  • Add fuzzer for incremental generators #68903
    Area-Compilers
  • Fix `unmanaged` type-parameter generation. And fix `init` accessor generation. #68960
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Fix lossy error message when lexer encounters certain characters #68919
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Fix assertion failure in semantic model for file-local extension methods #68962
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Fix missing duplicate diagnostic for enum declarations #68967
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Honor Concord's TruncatedString flag to reduce memory usage #68969
    Area-Interactive, Community, untriaged
  • Collection literals: collection builder methods #68930
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Move several value types over to being records #68956
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Reduce allocations of Location instances #68936
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged
  • Lazily calculate preview operations #68214
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Avoid cancellation exceptions in async queue implementation #68412
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Avoid creating a result temp for is-expressions #68694
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • 🧹 Declare MEF dependencies of VisualStudioWorkspace #54377
    Area-IDE
  • Warn on shadowing primary constructor parameter by a member from base #68864
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - Primary Constructors
